Travelblog

Follow me, Nicola, on my traveling adventures all around the world!

Stations so far:

Mexico

Vancouver

Welcome to my Blog

You’ve probably come here to find out more about my traveling experiences abroad.

Beginning in the summer of 2018, I’ve been able to do an international internship in Mexico. After working for some 10 weeks, I’ve decided to hit the road and travel the country’s marvelous south. All the while, I’ve kept my friends and family updated with weekly newsletters (in German) all of which you can find here.

For the new year of 2019, I’ve relocated to Vancouver to continue my studies as an exchange student. And to do many other things apart from studying, of course. Once again, I am trying to convert my experiences into English texts – while not with the same regularity for sure with the same passion.

This project is maintained by nkueng
